page.title: 15Local media
page.content: Most people read newspapers as a source of current affairs and information. Locally there are the National daily papers, 2 evening local papers{(Express and Star}and{The {Evening Mail}), 1 local weekly paper {(Kidderminster Shuttle}) and a number of free papers concerned mainly with advertisements. Magazines are coloured booklets which offer more specialist information on particular hobbies or trades.Both these types of publications are largely financed by advertisements. Advertisements provide the finance for 2 of the 4 television channels available.They are the independent commercial stations{(Central TV}in this area) the other two channels are owned by the{BBC}to whom a licence fee is paid annually by the viewer.
